SnapCycle was created with the inspiration to help with the suffering global climate. Realizing that many do not know what can and can\'t be recycled, along with the requirements to recycle certain items, such as washing cans, gave us the idea to create an application to assist with that - thus SnapCycle was born. SnapCycle allows users to simply take a picture of any item, and we will tell you what we think the item is and if the item can be recycled or not.
